interactionForm.description: Which of the following ways would you like to interact with AI?

categories.label: Textual
categories.description: All linear content such as plain text, symbols, code, etc. Text-only content, notables/images/audio.

subCategories.label: Text
subCategories.description: Plain text content including documents, articles, and written content.

subCategories.label: Code
subCategories.description: Programming code and source code files in various programming languages.

subCategories.label: Natural Language
subCategories.description: Natural language processing content including text analysis and language understanding.

subCategories.label: Prompt
subCategories.description: AI prompts and instructions for generating or processing content.

subCategories.label: Markdown
subCategories.description: Markdown formatted text for documentation and structured content.

subCategories.label: Plain Text
subCategories.description: Unformatted plain text content without any special formatting.

categories.label: Visual
categories.description: Visual content including images, videos, 3D models, and animations.

subCategories.label: Image
subCategories.description: Static images including photos, illustrations, and graphics.

subCategories.label: Chart
subCategories.description: Data visualization charts and graphs for presenting information.

subCategories.label: Graphics
subCategories.description: Graphic design elements and visual graphics.

subCategories.label: Screenshot
subCategories.description: Screen captures and screenshots of interfaces or content.

categories.label: Audio
categories.description: Audio content such as music, speech, and sound effects.

subCategories.label: Audio
subCategories.description: General audio content including music, sound effects, and audio files.

subCategories.label: Speech
subCategories.description: Spoken language content including voice recordings, speech recognition, and voice synthesis.

subCategories.label: Audio Features
subCategories.description: Audio feature extraction and analysis including frequency analysis, audio processing, and audio classification.

categories.label: Multimodal
categories.description: Content that combines multiple media types like video with audio, text with images, or interactive content.

subCategories.label: Image+Text
subCategories.description: Content combining images with text annotations or captions.

subCategories.label: Video+Audio
subCategories.description: Video content with synchronized audio tracks.

subCategories.label: MM Output
subCategories.description: Multimodal output combining different media types.

subCategories.label: Voice + Text
subCategories.description: Content combining voice recordings with text transcriptions.

categories.label: Structured Data
categories.description: Structured data formats including JSON, XML, CSV, and database formats.

subCategories.label: Table
subCategories.description: Tabular data organized in rows and columns.

subCategories.label: JSON
subCategories.description: JSON formatted data for structured information exchange.

subCategories.label: CSV
subCategories.description: Comma-separated values format for tabular data.

subCategories.label: DB Fields
subCategories.description: Database fields and structured database content.

subCategories.label: Sensor Data
subCategories.description: Data collected from sensors and IoT devices.

subCategories.label: Stream Data
subCategories.description: Real-time streaming data and continuous data feeds.

categories.label: Document Formats
categories.description: Common document formats like PDF, Word, Excel, and PowerPoint files.

subCategories.label: PDF
subCategories.description: PDF documents and portable document format files.

domain.description: Which domain are you interested in?

categories.label: Science & Nature
categories.description: Scientific fields and natural phenomena including biology, meteorology, geography, and environmental studies.

subCategories.label: Biology
subCategories.description: Biological sciences and life sciences research.

subCategories.label: Meteorology
subCategories.description: Weather and climate science including atmospheric studies.

subCategories.label: Geography
subCategories.description: Geographic and spatial information and mapping.

categories.label: Industry & Energy
categories.description: Industrial sectors and energy-related fields including manufacturing, transportation, and agriculture.

categories.label: Health & Medicine
categories.description: Healthcare and medical fields including biomedical research and public health.

subCategories.label: Healthcare
subCategories.description: Healthcare services and medical care delivery.

subCategories.label: Public Health
subCategories.description: Public health initiatives and population health.

categories.label: Finance & Economics
categories.description: Financial and economic sectors including fintech, markets, and financial analysis.

subCategories.label: Fintech
subCategories.description: Financial technology and digital finance solutions.

subCategories.label: Financial Analysis
subCategories.description: Financial data analysis and investment research.

categories.label: Law, Governance & Public Affairs
categories.description: Legal, governance, and public affairs including law, policy, and city management.

subCategories.label: Governance / City Management
subCategories.description: City governance and urban management systems.

categories.label: Communication & Media
categories.description: Communication and media industries including content creation, news, and advertising.

subCategories.label: Content Creation
subCategories.description: Content creation and creative media production.

categories.label: Social & Culture
categories.description: Social and cultural fields including entertainment, sports, art, and community.

subCategories.label: Social
subCategories.description: Social interactions and social media content.

categories.label: Education & Learning
categories.description: Educational and learning fields including training, coaching, and learning tools.

categories.label: AI & Computing
categories.description: Artificial intelligence and computing fields including algorithms, data, models, and generation.

subCategories.label: Model
subCategories.description: AI models and machine learning models.

subCategories.label: Generation & Inference
subCategories.description: Content generation and AI inference processes.

object.description: What type of object are you looking for?

action.description: What action would you like to perform?

categories.label: Generate
categories.description: Actions related to creating and generating new content.

subCategories.label: Generate
subCategories.description: Generate new content from scratch or based on inputs.

subCategories.label: Summarize
subCategories.description: Create summaries and condensed versions of content.

categories.label: Analysis
categories.description: Actions related to understanding and analyzing content.

categories.label: Organize
categories.description: Actions related to organizing and structuring content.

subCategories.label: Coordinate
subCategories.description: Coordinate and synchronize multiple content pieces.

categories.label: Search
categories.description: Actions related to searching and retrieving information.

subCategories.label: Search
subCategories.description: Search for specific information and content.

categories.label: Interact
categories.description: Actions related to interaction and communication.

categories.label: Emotion
categories.description: Actions related to emotional support and encouragement.

categories.label: Others
categories.description: Other actions not covered by the above categories.
